title: This is the weirdest problem I have ever seen
body: So whenever i play a game, my computer completely freezes halfway through. I can play OTHER pc games no problem, on max settings, i'm running a 1400$ gaming laptop. However, for some reason, league freezes halfway through no matter what settings i use, and i've already tried everything i can think of, including the XBOX APP fix. My game is ALSO stuck at 60 FPS no matter what i do. I can go lowest settings or highest and it stays at 60 fps. HALP

replies.body:
You may be seeing this as a result of hardware or operating system issues. To ensure we've weeded out the easy solutions, take a look at our [Bugsplat & Crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure your local configurations are good.

Let me know if you continue to see this issue after taking those steps.
